sentences.english: A complex short circuit capacity method is proposed as an alternative to the per unit method.
sentences.chinese: 複數短路容量法可替代常規的標麼值法。

sentences.english: The wire snapped at the wall plug and the light fused.
sentences.chinese: 牆上插座的電線短路燒斷了保險絲，電燈跟着滅了。

sentences.english: Generator out of operation due to short circuit.
The effect of coating materials on the short circuiting behaviour is also analysed.
sentences.chinese: 文中還就藥皮成分對短路行爲的影響進行了試驗分析。

sentences.english: Equipped with grounding switch load switch, can withstand short-circuit current.
sentences.chinese: 配裝接地開關的負荷開關，可以承受短路電流。

sentences.english: In this paper, the application scope of ice-melting of tranmission lines by short-circuit current is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中還探討了短路電流融冰方案的適用範圍。

sentences.english: Anti-shortcircuit; good performance to withstand the lightning impulse.
sentences.chinese: 抗短路，耐雷電衝擊性能好。

sentences.english: A short circuit put the machine out of action.
The static switch is sized to clear most short-circuits and transient current spikes.
sentences.chinese: 靜態開關的大小來清除最短路和瞬時電流峯值。

sentences.english: Very few Soldering Balls occur and cut down the short circuit.
sentences.chinese: 焊接時產生的錫珠少，減少短路現象的發生。

sentences.english: In using, the secondary winding can not be short-circuited or operating over-load.
sentences.chinese: 使用時二次繞組不能短路及超負荷運行。

sentences.english: The weighted shortest path arborescence game.
sentences.chinese: 加權最短路樹形圖對策問題。

sentences.english: Miniaturization of the electronic components to prevent whisker cause a short circuit accident.
sentences.chinese: 小型化的電子元件需防止晶須造成短路事故。

sentences.english: Your idea of cutting back is less seltzer.
sentences.chinese: 你短路的想法是蘇打水再少一點。

definition: to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
(of a circuit breaker or switch) to trip
(of a circuit breaker or switch) to trip
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
